1.name: Planet Express
1.description: A bustling delivery company in the year 3000.

2.name: Shiganshina District
2.description: A walled city on the frontier, always under threat of Titans.

3.name: Night City
3.description: A sprawling cyberpunk metropolis, full of neon lights and danger.

4.name: Konoha Village
4.description: A peaceful village hidden in the leaves, home to powerful ninja.

5.name: Targoviste
5.description: An ancient city haunted by the presence of vampires.

6.name: Grid
6.description: A digital frontier where programs come to life, surrounded by neon.

7.name: Hogwarts
7.description: The famous school of witchcraft and wizardry, full of magical secrets.

8.name: Westeros
8.description: A land of political intrigue and warring kingdoms.

9.name: Citadel
9.description: A hub for interdimensional travelers, full of alternate realities.

10.name: Ghost Zone
10.description: A parallel dimension inhabited by ghosts and spirits.

11.name: Mushroom Kingdom
11.description: A colorful world filled with adventure and danger, ruled by Princess Peach.
